resources.string:
This program is provided as is without any guarantees or warranty.
Although the author has attempted to find and correct any bugs in the free software programs, the author is not responsible for any damage or losses of any kind caused by the use or misuse of the program.
The author is under no obligation to provide support, service, corrections, or upgrades to the free software programs.

The purpose of this program is to change system files, by doing so bugs or errors can cause instability, total collapse or even rendering the device completely useless!

Use it at your own risk!

"Scripter" was built to simplify the way users will run scripts.
If you have an idea, found a bug or want to make a suggestion then please use the "Contact Developer" option and send me an email.

This application was made while using some code that can be found at:
* market-access
* market-enabler
* Su by ChainsDD
And many help sites all over the web.
Also Thank the people that help me test the application:
* Omer Itzhaki
* nisim2337
*Avraham Makovetsky
And others

"Scripter" is an open source project that was created by Dror Buhnik (Fazik Logic team of one)

Cannot find su binary in your device.
In order to use this application you must have root permissions.

Please head over to the web and search on methods to root your device.

Cannot find busybox binary in your device.
In order to use this application you must have busybox installed

Please head over to the web and search on methods to install busybox in your device.
Cannot find the scanning application.\nPlease install \"Barcode Scanner\" before using this option
